title: UK and Canada sign AI compute agreement
description:
The UK and Canada have signed a landmark agreement to collaborate on the computing power needed to advance AI research and development.  The new Memorandum of Understanding on compute was signed in Ottawa by UK Technology Secretary Michelle Donelan and Canadian Minister for Innovation, Science and Industry François-Phillippe Champagne. It cements the two countries’ partnership... Read more »

The post UK and Canada sign AI compute agreement appeared first on AI News.
